item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Fleetwood Mac - Rumours (Rhino Music Atmos Blu-Ray)
item.description:
Does anyone have a lossless rip of the Alternative/Early/Limited/Unfinished version of the song Quando Você Passa (Turu Turu) by Sandy & Junior?
This version of the song was released by accident in early pressings of the album Sandy & Junior (2001) and also in the "2 por 1" limited compilation (which included both their Sandy & Junior 2001 album - containing the version I'm looking for - together with the album As Quatro Estações - Discogs link below).
This version has different mixing from the final version, with Junior's vocals missing in some parts.
Below are 2 YouTube video uploads of this version, you can notice Junior's vocals are not present at 3:26, for example.
I'm looking for a lossless rip (flac/wav/alac).







-Edição Limitada 2 por 1 (As quatro estações e 2001)-

https://www.discogs.com/release/4697956-Sandy-Junior-As-Quatro-Estações-Sandy-Junior
item.author: assumepinstrip
